title: varuvAi enrun
sahitya:
varuvAi enrun vazhi pArttirundEn varAdadEnO raghunandanA nI


anupallavi

  maravA varam tandun malariNai satatamum piriyA varam tand-ippEdaiyai AtkoLLa


caraNam    marakata mEniyin kAnti engum minna karuvizhi iraNDilum karuNai oLi minna
 kara kamalam tannil kOdaNDam minna parindunakkabhayam tandOm enrE panna
